item.title: Discounted Dining Finder
item.description: This post describes how I developed the Discount Dining Finder a lookup map tool for the Eat Out to Help Out scheme in my spare time. I currently work with Equal Experts and HMRC. The aim of this writing is to provide an insight into how problems of scaling services can be solved by having no servers and not using “serverless services” either. Aperitif A really nice side effect in working in a high functioning environment is that sometimes you’re involved in bouncing ideas off each other.
